content: And let me walk you a little bit through year-by-year what we see coming online, which influences the numbers when we're looking to 2023 and our priority is to get that low single comp, like single digit comp number, key sources of growth, there will be leaning in on own brands, that's Ion, that's Strawberry Leopards, that's bondbar rebuilding our nail category, we have a new nail wall set in both Sally and BSG stores and seeing good responses there, nearly doubling the Regis business that we have, which really leverages the e-commerce platform we built.
